path: PDF Library/30 Rock Studio Maintenance - Graphic Maintenance Quick Reference/General/Mapping Network Drives.docx
text: Open My Computer or This PC, and on the top bar, select 'Map Network Drive.' This step may be different depending on the version of Windows. Select the correct drive letter from the drop down. This is specific and the correct letter must be used. Enter the full network path of the folder to be mapped, select Reconnect at sign-on and Log in using different credentials. Enter the network credentials. Note: if you are using a local log in to the network path, instead of 'tfayd\' use '.\' in front of the user name. Click to remember the credentials.
